about.title: About Landa
about.text: Landa Holding distinguishes itself through extensive charity work and world-class transaction capabilities that enable private business growth. The company connects reliable global investors to top startup opportunities by linking idea holders with relevant service providers.

text.canada: No. 200, 7646 Yonge Street, Thornhill, Toronto, ON L4J 1V9, Canada
text.tehran: Office 41, No. 27, Gholam Jafari Street, Tajrish Square, Tehran, Iran
